sentences.en: The main attractions of the Big Apple are well documented.
sentences.cn: 纽约城主要景点被很好地记录在案。

sentences.en: About a thousand formations have been documented.
sentences.cn: 将近1000种构造已经被记录在册。

sentences.en: It is called childhood amnesia and was first documented in 1893.
sentences.cn: 它被称为儿童健忘症，最早记录于1893年。
